Applicant : Ivie, Christine
School (district) : Heritage Academy Public Charter School (Heritage Academy Public Charter School LEA #479)
Role(s) : College and/or Career Counselor/Advisor;Administrator;At times, I teach middle and high school classes as well;
LinkedIn Profile : I have volunteered in organizations that focus on at-risk youth, juvenile justice, court diversion, etc. I also volunteered as a Junior Achievement teacher/presenter and board member. I love strategic planning and career counseling, so I participate in those types of opportunities when possible. Unrelated to work, I love the mountains, backpacking, water sports and music.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am hoping to make connections that help our middle school students develop stronger plans for advanced opportunities, dual credit, college and career technical education. I also want to gain experience in a different setting that might help our school/district with our expansion plans and strategic plan goals.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid

EXPERIENCE

	* Life Science / Biology
	* Math
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)

	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Business & Small Business Development

Elementary teaching : No

Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I have volunteered in organizations that focus on at-risk youth, juvenile justice, court diversion, etc. I also volunteered as a Junior Achievement teacher/presenter and board member. I love strategic planning and career counseling, so I participate in those types of opportunities when possible. Unrelated to work, I love the mountains, backpacking, water sports and music.

Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am hoping to make connections that help our middle school students develop stronger plans for advanced opportunities, dual credit, college and career technical education. I also want to gain experience in a different setting that might help our school/district with our expansion plans and strategic plan goals.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* No specific preference - anything goes!
	* Math
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Business & Small Business Development

EXPERIENCE

	* 1
	* 2
	* 3
	* 4
	* 5

	* 8
	* 9

	* Postsecondary

	* Life Science / Biology
	* Math
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Project Management	* Adult Education / Training	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I have volunteered in organizations that focus on at-risk youth, juvenile justice, court diversion, etc. I also volunteered as a Junior Achievement teacher/presenter and board member. I love strategic planning and career counseling, so I participate in those types of opportunities when possible. Unrelated to work, I love the mountains, backpacking, water sports and music.

	* Phone : 2088717749
	* Communication & Availability : Tuesday - Thursday anytime
Applicant : Ivie, Christine
School (district) : Heritage Academy Public Charter School (Heritage Academy Public Charter School LEA #479)
Role(s) : College and/or Career Counselor/Advisor;Administrator;At times, I teach middle and high school classes as well;
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/christine-ivie-a0349aa3

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am hoping to make connections that help our middle school students develop stronger plans for advanced opportunities, dual credit, college and career technical education. I also want to gain experience in a different setting that might help our school/district with our expansion plans and strategic plan goals.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* No specific preference - anything goes!
	* Math
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Business & Small Business Development

	* 1
	* 2
	* 3
	* 4
	* 5

	* Life Science / Biology

	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)

	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Project Management	* Adult Education / Training	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* Email & Administrative Software	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : Yes
Adult Teaching : Yes
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : Yes
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I have volunteered in organizations that focus on at-risk youth, juvenile justice, court diversion, etc. I also volunteered as a Junior Achievement teacher/presenter and board member. I love strategic planning and career counseling, so I participate in those types of opportunities when possible. Unrelated to work, I love the mountains, backpacking, water sports and music.

I have volunteered in organizations that focus on at-risk youth, juvenile justice, court diversion, etc. I also volunteered as a Junior Achievement teacher/presenter and board member. I love strategic planning and career counseling, so I participate in those types of opportunities when possible. Unrelated to work, I love the mountains, backpacking, water sports and music.

Applicant : Ivie, Christine
School (district) : Heritage Academy Public Charter School (Heritage Academy Public Charter School LEA #479)
Role(s) : College and/or Career Counselor/Advisor;Administrator;At times, I teach middle and high school classes as well;
LinkedIn Profile : https://www.linkedin.com/in/christine-ivie-a0349aa3

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am hoping to make connections that help our middle school students develop stronger plans for advanced opportunities, dual credit, college and career technical education. I also want to gain experience in a different setting that might help our school/district with our expansion plans and strategic plan goals.
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* No specific preference - anything goes!
	* Math
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Business & Small Business Development
